name: formval
description: Formval is a form validation "framework" that makes the tedious job of validating HTML Forms using AJAX a lot easier, concise and fun. ## Example ### HTML Form ``` <form id="signup-form">   <!-- inputs -->   <input type="text" name="firstname">   <input type="text" name="lastname">   <input type="text" name="email">   <input type="password" name="password">   <input type="password" name="confirm-password">   <!-- submit button -->   <button data-formal="submit">Sign Up!</button> </form> ``` ### JavaScript ``` var signUpForm = F("signup-form", function(form, response){
